_json.gridTitle: How to Get Out Of A DEPRESSIVE EPISODE Step 1: Acknowledge that the "depression cloud" has ta ken over Step 2: Identify the "weapons" it is using to distort your perception: . Labels you as things you‘re not - identity becomes based on 1 action o Overgeneraiizes things so you believe it'll "always be this way" Step 3: Fight back with these "weapons" that allow some sun through: ' Gratítude: What is one thing you're grateful for? Step 4: If you feel like its weapons are stronger than yours and you're exhausted, breathe slow and deeply and repeat this positive affirmation: ; "Just because the sun isn't shining through now [ª doesn't mean it never will." . _ . , Please share this It could really help someone in need. @RealDepressionProject - iFunny
